heading: HR01255
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE AND THE NATIONAL COMMISSION ON MUSLIM FILIPINOS, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO PROVIDE A  BRIEFING TO THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON THE STATUS OF THE CASES FILED AND FINDINGS REGARDING THE INDONESIANS USING PHILIPPINE HAJJ PASSPORTS DURING THE 2016 HAJJ PILGRIMAGE

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01255
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE AND THE NATIONAL COMMISSION ON MUSLIM FILIPINOS, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO PROVIDE A BRIEFING TO THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON THE STATUS OF THE CASES FILED AND FINDINGS REGARDING THE INDONESIANS USING PHILIPPINE HAJJ PASSPORTS DURING THE 2016 HAJJ PILGRIMAGE
